products.title: iTunes Gift Card
products.description: Perfect for purchasing apps, games, music, movies, and more from the iTunes Store. Compatible with all Apple devices and services.
products.redeem: Redeem directly in the iTunes Store or App Store on your Apple device
products.termsConditions: Valid for use in iTunes Store only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. No expiration date. Subject to iTunes Store terms and conditions.

products.title: Steam Wallet Codes
products.description: Add funds to your Steam Wallet to purchase games, DLC, and in-game content from the Steam Store. Instant digital delivery.
products.redeem: Log into Steam, go to 'Redeem a Steam Wallet Code' and enter your code
products.termsConditions: Valid for Steam Store purchases only. Cannot be transferred or exchanged for cash. Subject to Steam Subscriber Agreement.

products.title: PlayStation™Store Gift Cards
products.description: Purchase games, add-ons, themes, and more from the PlayStation Store. Compatible with PS4, PS5, and PlayStation Network.
products.redeem: Redeem through PlayStation Store on your console or via web browser
products.termsConditions: Valid for PlayStation Store purchases. Cannot be returned or exchanged for cash. Subject to PlayStation Network Terms of Service.

products.title: Google Play Code
products.description: Use to purchase apps, games, movies, books, and more from Google Play Store. Perfect for Android users and Google services.
products.redeem: Open Google Play Store app, go to Menu > Redeem and enter your code
products.termsConditions: Valid for Google Play Store purchases only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Google Play Terms of Service.

products.title: Roblox Digital Gift Card
products.description: Get Robux to customize your avatar, buy game passes, and unlock premium features in Roblox games. Perfect for young gamers.
products.redeem: Visit roblox.com/redeem and enter your gift card code to add Robux to your account
products.termsConditions: Valid for Robux and Roblox Premium only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Roblox Terms of Use.

products.title: PUBG Mobile UC
products.description: Purchase Unknown Cash (UC) for PUBG Mobile to buy premium battle passes, skins, and exclusive in-game items.
products.redeem: Open PUBG Mobile, go to the UC purchase section and use the redemption code
products.termsConditions: Valid for PUBG Mobile UC purchases only. Cannot be transferred between accounts. Subject to PUBG Mobile Terms of Service.

products.title: Amazon Gift Card
products.description: Shop for millions of items on Amazon with this versatile gift card. Perfect for books, electronics, home goods, and more.
products.redeem: Enter the gift card code at checkout on Amazon.com
products.termsConditions: Valid for Amazon purchases only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Amazon Gift Card Terms and Conditions.

products.title: Netflix Gift Card
products.description: Enjoy unlimited streaming of movies and TV shows with a Netflix subscription gift card. Perfect for entertainment lovers.
products.redeem: Visit netflix.com/redeem and enter your gift card code
products.termsConditions: Valid for Netflix subscription only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Netflix Terms of Use.

products.title: Spotify Gift Card
products.description: Enjoy premium music streaming with ad-free listening, offline downloads, and high-quality audio on Spotify Premium.
products.redeem: Redeem at spotify.com/redeem with your gift card code
products.termsConditions: Valid for Spotify Premium subscription only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Spotify Terms and Conditions.

products.title: Xbox Gift Card

products.redeem: Redeem on Xbox console or Microsoft Store online
products.termsConditions: Valid for Microsoft Store purchases only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Microsoft Terms of Use.

products.title: Visa Gift Card

products.redeem: Use like a regular Visa card at any merchant that accepts Visa
products.termsConditions: Subject to Visa Gift Card Terms and Conditions. Fees may apply. Cannot be exchanged for cash.

products.title: Apple Gift Card
products.description: Use for purchases at Apple Store, iTunes, App Store, and more. Compatible with all Apple devices and services.
products.redeem: Redeem directly in any Apple Store or online at apple.com
products.termsConditions: Valid for Apple Store and iTunes purchases. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Apple Terms and Conditions.

products.title: Fortnite V-Bucks

products.termsConditions: Valid for Fortnite V-Bucks only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Epic Games Terms of Service.

products.termsConditions: Valid for League of Legends RP only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Riot Games Terms of Service.

products.redeem: Redeem in Call of Duty game or Battle.net
products.termsConditions: Valid for Call of Duty Points only. Cannot be exchanged for cash. Subject to Activision Terms of Service.

products.description: Add funds directly to your PayPal account for secure online payments and transfers worldwide.
